name: disable cookie message
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
disables the cookie message on sourceforge.net / vmware.com / oracle.com / slashdot.org

CHANGE LOG

2018-01-09 - just updated the licence to "no redistribution" 2016-02-12 changed css queries on sourceforge.net and vmware.com. maybe other sites use the same queries as well or completly different... can not see any cookie message on oracle.com or slashdot.org. removed anonymouse.org because the free service does not allowe https request anymore. as sorceforge changed all request to https. 2014-11-07 slashdot.org and anonymouse.org domain added 2014-11-06 oracle.com domain added 2014-10-21 vmware.com domain added !important added (due to support firefox) 2014-10-14 style created for sourceforge.net created and tested in google chrome browser version Version 38.0.2125.101 m screenshots ( before / after ) added
